TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITransformProvider

summary.span: 公开一些方法和属性，以支持 UI 自动化客户端访问可移动、调整大小或在二维空间中旋转的控件。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can be moved, resized, or rotated within a two-dimensional space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在必须支持控件模式的 UI 自动化提供程序上实现 。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern. 对此控件模式的支持并不限于桌面上的对象。Support for this control pattern is not limited to objects on the desktop. 此控件模式还必须由容器对象的子级实现，前提是可以在容器边界内自由移动、调整大小或旋转子级。This control pattern must also be implemented by the children of a container object as long as the children can be moved, resized, or rotated freely within the boundaries of the container.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Move (double x, double y);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Move(float64 x, float64 y) cil managed
Public Sub Move (x As Double, y As Double)
public: void Move(double x, double y);
abstract member Move : double * double -> unit

param.name: x
param.span: 此控件左侧的绝对屏幕坐标。

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.

param.name: y
param.span: 此控件顶部的绝对屏幕坐标。

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.
Moves the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能移动、调整大小或旋转对象，使其生成的屏幕位置完全在其容器的坐标之外并且无法通过键盘或鼠标访问。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶级窗口完全移离屏幕或子对象移动到容器的视区边界之外时。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这种情况下，将对象放置在尽可能靠近所请求的屏幕坐标的位置，并将其重写为位于容器边界内。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此方法对于可移动的自定义控件的一种可能实现。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control that can be moved. [!code-csharp[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Move](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/CSharp/TransformFragment.cs#move)] [!code-vb[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Move](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/visualbasic/transformfragment.vb#move)]

span.span: If the property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Resize (double width, double height);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Resize(float64 width, float64 height) cil managed
Public Sub Resize (width As Double, height As Double)
public: void Resize(double width, double height);
abstract member Resize : double * double -> unit

param.name: width
param.span: 窗口的新宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The new width of the window, in pixels.

param.name: height
param.span: 窗口的新高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The new height of the window, in pixels.
Resizes the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在支持拆分窗格的控件上调用此方法时，此方法可能会影响调整其他连续窗格的副作用。When called on a control that supports split panes, this method can have the side effect of resizing other contiguous panes. 不能移动、调整大小或旋转对象，使其生成的屏幕位置完全在其容器的坐标之外并且无法通过键盘或鼠标访问。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶级窗口完全移离屏幕或子对象移动到容器的视区边界之外时。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这种情况下，将对象放置在尽可能靠近所请求的屏幕坐标的位置，并将其重写为位于容器边界内。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此方法对于可以调整大小的自定义控件的一种可能实现。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control that can be resized. [!code-csharp[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Resize](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/CSharp/TransformFragment.cs#resize)] [!code-vb[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Resize](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/visualbasic/transformfragment.vb#resize)]

span.span: If the property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Rotate (double degrees);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Rotate(float64 degrees) cil managed
Public Sub Rotate (degrees As Double)
public: void Rotate(double degrees);
abstract member Rotate : double -> unit

param.name: degrees

span.span: The number of degrees to rotate the control.

param.span: 正数会顺时针旋转；负数会逆时针旋转。

span.span: A positive number rotates clockwise; a negative number rotates counterclockwise.
Rotates the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象不能移动、调整大小或旋转，使其生成的屏幕位置完全在其容器的坐标之外并且无法访问键盘或鼠标。An object cannot be moved, resized or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶级窗口完全移离屏幕或子对象移动到容器的视区边界之外时。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这种情况下，将对象放置在尽可能靠近所请求的屏幕坐标的位置，并将其重写为位于容器边界内。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此方法对于无法旋转的自定义控件的一种可能实现。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control that cannot be rotated. [!code-csharp[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Rotate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/CSharp/TransformFragment.cs#rotate)] [!code-vb[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Rotate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/visualbasic/transformfragment.vb#rotate)]
